greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n-digit decimal numbers containing a fixed 2-digit integer with distinct digits as a substring.
comment: See A138288 for the number of n-digit decimal numbers that do not contain a fixed 2-digit integer with distinct digits as a substring.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (20,-101,10).
maple: seq(coeff(series(x^2*(x-1)/((10*x-1)*(x^2-10*x+1)),x,n+1), x, n), n = 0 .. 20); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Dec 21 2018
program: (Python) def find_int(i): intlist = [0,1,19] for n in range(4,i+2): if n > 3: a = 10*(intlist[n-2])+(9*10**(n-3)-intlist[n-3]) intlist.append(a) return (intlist[i-1])for i in range(1,100): print(find_int(i))
(GAP) a:=[0,1,19];; for n in [4..20] do a[n]:=20*a[n-1]-101*a[n-2]+10*a[n-3]; od; Concatenation([0],a); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Dec 21 2018
results.author: _Owen M Sheff_, Dec 20 2018
